page.syntax: Key as P = ui_get_key([C title [,C prompt [,N type [,C expression_or_index_name [,C imagename ]]]]])

argument.name: Key
argument.description:
A dot variable with two properties.
.value = return_value
.type = variable type

argument.name: title
argument.description: Optional. Default = "Find by Key". The title of the dialog.

argument.name: prompt
argument.description: Optional. Default = "Search for". The prompt to the left of the text box.

argument.name: type
argument.description:
Optional. Default = 1.
1 = Name will contain the name of an index
2 = based on current primary index

argument.name: expression_or_index_name
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The name of an index if Type is 1. An order expression if Type is 2.

page.description: Find by key. Type 1 = index name, Type 2 = any expression.
page.discussion: The UI_GET_KEY() function displays a dialog that prompts the user to select a key value from an index. You must run this function from a form layout.
page.example: dim value as C value = UI_GET_KEY("Last Name", "Select Last Name", 1,) ui_msg_box("", value)
